vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.21;
son of: Zerah (H2226J);
father of: Malchijah (H4441); also called Ethni at 1Ch.6.41;
Also named: et.ni (אֶתְנִי "Ethni" H0867)
§ Jeaterai = "whom Jehovah leads"
a Gershonite Levite, son of Zerah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Zérah; descendiente de Libní; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶特賴 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "耶和華所帶領的"
哥轄家的利未人, 謝拉的兒子 (代上 6:21)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶特赖 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "耶和华所带领的"
哥辖家的利未人, 谢拉的儿子 (代上 6:21)
